input.sentences: the class was coming up with ideas on how to decorate the class room .
the teacher went around the table asking the kids .
after deciding | they got to work .
output.sentences: Mrs. Norris was a wonderful art teacher, and she loved inspiring her students to be creative.
She gave her students an assignment; everyone was to paint a self portrait.
The students gathered their supplies and began to plan out their projects.
Paint got everywhere as the students enthusiastically set about painting their portraits.
The end result was messy, but a great deal of fun.
